name: FRAKT (devByARTZ)
description:
FRAKT is an exploration 3D platformer in first-person. The game composed of several levels, each levels composed of several checkpoint. To complete levels, you need to validate all the checkpoints and reach the end point.

Twitter (follow for more info)

CURRENT PATCH (0.0.1) :

  • 4 Levels
  • Save Personal Score
  • Gameplay Features : Wall Jump, Hook

PLANNED FEATURES:

  • New Levels
  • Custom Level Editor : create and share your own Levels.
  • Checkpoint Restart: you will be able to restart at the last checkpoint (do not reset the timer)
  • New Gameplay Features (move platforms with hook, change dimensions, gun)
  • Better Timer Tracker
  • HUD Improvement
  • Graphic Settings
  • Keybinding
  • Graphic Upgrades

GAME SUPPORT ONLY WINDOWS (64-BIT)
